name: atmosx-nwws-parser
description: NOAA Weather Wire Parser - Built for standalone and Project AtmosphericX Integration.

scripts.publish-github: powershell -Command "(Get-Content package.json) -replace '"name": "atmosx-nwws-parser"', '"name": "@k3yomi/atmosx-nwws-parser"' | Set-Content package.json; npx tsup --clean; npm publish --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/; (Get-Content package.json) -replace '"name": "@k3yomi/atmosx-nwws-parser"', '"name": "atmosx-nwws-parser"' | Set-Content package.json"

author: k3yomi, StarflightWx
